@Hrock

It does for me. I changed compatibility of all exe files to Windows XP SP3 and it worked nicely. You also have to install that "open al" thing that you'll find in the game folder after install.
where in inst dir is the file that need to be replaced? and the game crashes right after the intro... also i cant find open al thing in the inst dir...

If Error Message About "Cannot Initialize Game"
Run "I'm Not Alone Configuration Settings" Choose Audio/Device And Select Your Sound Card ,,, That's All.

If Error Message About "Cannot Initialize Game"
 go to S2Config and change audio device defaul by your sound card and thas all enjoy... Happy Game
